channel.title: ScrewAttack's SideScrollers
channel.description: The perfect blend of what ScrewAttack is all about, SideScrollers is all about video games and fun. Your host Stuttering Craig is joined weekly by the rest of the ScrewAttack crew
channel.itunes:author: ScrewAttack.com
channel.itunes:summary: The perfect blend of what ScrewAttack is all about, SideScrollers is all about video games and fun. Your host Stuttering Craig is joined weekly by ScrewAttack favorites Daily Destin, Maxifent Corey, Jose elMexicano, HighSchool Ben and even the Angry Video Game Nerd.
channel.itunes:subtitle: ScrewAttack.com's award winning podcast of all things rad

item.title: SideScrollers - "Death by Beaver"
item.description: Chad, Nick and Sam get serious with next gen console talk... then things get a little weird when they find out about death... by Beaver.
item.itunes:subtitle: Chad, Nick and Sam get serious with next gen console talk... then things get a little weird when they find out about death... by Beaver....

item.title: SideScrollers - "Bosnian Bear Wrestling"
item.description: An interested week as Sam and Nick are left to fend for themselves.  Will they survive???
item.itunes:subtitle: An interested week as Sam and Nick are left to fend for themselves.  Will they survive???...

item.title: SideScrollers - "Just a Gaggle"
item.description: Chad, Nick and Sam talk about eveything from Geese to gun wielding old ladies!
item.itunes:subtitle: Chad, Nick and Sam talk about eveything from Geese to gun wielding old ladies!...

item.description: Chad, Nick and Sam talk about gaming food and Sam enlightens us on his culinary creations
item.itunes:subtitle: Chad, Nick and Sam talk about gaming food and Sam enlightens us on his culinary creations...

item.title: Playboy Miss October 2012 Interview
item.description: Sam interviews Playboy's Miss October 2012, Pamela Horton.  Guess what?  She's got masive LoL game!
item.itunes:subtitle: Sam interviews Playboy's Miss October 2012, Pamela Horton.  Guess what?  She's got masive LoL game!...

item.description: With E3 NEXT WEEK already, we give our real predictions about the Big Three!
item.itunes:subtitle: With E3 NEXT WEEK already, we give our real predictions about the Big Three!...

Some Newsdesk stories just can't be re-enacted. Along with one of those is Zelda talk and ninjas!

item.title: Vote for the Bald Guy

item.title: A Bag of Mulch
item.description: This week we're featuring the first ever video user questions, the gang talks about girl scout cookies, Capcom-whoring, and of course.... Destin's final show.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we're featuring the first ever video user questions, the gang talks about girl scout cookies, Capcom-whoring, and of course.... Destin's final show....

item.title: SideScrollers 02.23.11
item.description: As we continue to get used to this video podcast thing, the guys have to keep things brief to stay under YouTube's 2gig limit. Are you fine with lower quality and a longer show or is this length just right?
item.itunes:subtitle: As we continue to get used to this video podcast thing, the guys have to keep things brief to stay under YouTube's 2gig limit. Are you fine with lower quality and a longer show or is this length just right?...

item.title: It's Time for Video!
item.description: To celebrate our five year birthday this week we wanted to take ScrewAttack's first feature, SideScrollers, to the next level with a little HD video. Thanks for your support over the last five years.
item.itunes:subtitle: To celebrate our five year birthday this week we wanted to take ScrewAttack's first feature, SideScrollers, to the next level with a little HD video. Thanks for your support over the last five years....

item.title: What a Bunch of Morons
item.description: In addition to hitting on why the media is a bunch of morons, the guys give you details on the big plans for our 5 year birthday and when you'll be able to see the video version of SideScrollers.
item.itunes:subtitle: In addition to hitting on why the media is a bunch of morons, the guys give you details on the big plans for our 5 year birthday and when you'll be able to see the video version of SideScrollers....

item.title: All Snowed Out...
item.description: With horrible winter weather making the roads undrivable, the crew can't make it into the HQ so this week we have a SideScrollers first - a Skype recorded episode.  Because of that, please excuse the audio imbalances ;)
item.itunes:subtitle: With horrible winter weather making the roads undrivable, the crew can't make it into the HQ so this week we have a SideScrollers first - a Skype recorded episode.  Because of that, please excuse the audio imbalances ;)...

item.title: Mini Movie Review
item.description: As we continue to tinker with video tests and all that jazz, we also tinker with potential new segments.  This week we play with the "Mini Movie Review".  Yay or Nah?
item.itunes:subtitle: As we continue to tinker with video tests and all that jazz, we also tinker with potential new segments.  This week we play with the "Mini Movie Review".  Yay or Nah?...

item.title: Technology is AMAZING
item.description: As you continue to get jipped by only being allowed to hear us as we continue to test out video, Craig attempts make it up to you by gushing over Netflix for 10 minutes.
item.itunes:subtitle: As you continue to get jipped by only being allowed to hear us as we continue to test out video, Craig attempts make it up to you by gushing over Netflix for 10 minutes....

item.title: Test-Test-Testaroo
item.description: Going with a four man crew this week of Craig, Destin, Chad and Jared, the guys are stoked for GAMEuary as well as some new testing of a video format... which will be coming soon.  Yes, you'll still be able to download and listen.
item.itunes:subtitle: Going with a four man crew this week of Craig, Destin, Chad and Jared, the guys are stoked for GAMEuary as well as some new testing of a video format... which will be coming soon.  Yes, you'll still be able to download and listen....

item.title: Shockakahn? No, Shacka-Con!
item.description: Have you ever been to a convention?  If so, what were some of your experiences?  This week Craig, Chad and Destin share there experiences as well as give you the first heads up on what's going on with SGC.
item.itunes:subtitle: Have you ever been to a convention?  If so, what were some of your experiences?  This week Craig, Chad and Destin share there experiences as well as give you the first heads up on what's going on with SGC....

item.title: 3...2...1... Happy New Year!
item.description: As we count down the hours to 2011, the guys... don't do anything at all to celebrate the coming new year at all.  Instead Craig, Chad and Bryan talk about how Milwaukee, Wisconsin has a vendetta against bad words.
item.itunes:subtitle: As we count down the hours to 2011, the guys... don't do anything at all to celebrate the coming new year at all.  Instead Craig, Chad and Bryan talk about how Milwaukee, Wisconsin has a vendetta against bad words....

item.title: Mountain Men Love Them Some Christmas
item.description: As the last SideScrollers prior to Christmas Craig did a little digging and found a list of gifts all men should want as presents.  Do you want anything on the list?  Also, we hope you're enjoying Old School Week!
item.itunes:subtitle: As the last SideScrollers prior to Christmas Craig did a little digging and found a list of gifts all men should want as presents.  Do you want anything on the list?  Also, we hope you're enjoying Old School Week!...

item.title: Technology is an Amazing Thing
item.description: With the guys in full "production mode" as the holiday approaches, an honest look at this past weekends VGAs are warranted.  Are they going to hate on them like everyone else on the internet? You may be surprised.
item.itunes:subtitle: With the guys in full "production mode" as the holiday approaches, an honest look at this past weekends VGAs are warranted.  Are they going to hate on them like everyone else on the internet? You may be surprised....

item.title: The 19th Floor is Haunted!
item.description: Craig recently had a "close encounter" with a ghost and it pretty much scared the pee out of him.  Take a listen and find out where he was and make sure to share your ghost stories as well.
item.itunes:subtitle: Craig recently had a "close encounter" with a ghost and it pretty much scared the pee out of him.  Take a listen and find out where he was and make sure to share your ghost stories as well....

item.title: It's Time For DEATH BATTLE!

item.itunes:subtitle: While we breeze into the month of Gamecember, the guys hit on the the upcoming month of lackluster games but hook you up with some details on our brand new show coming this Tuesday - DEATH BATTLE!...

item.itunes:subtitle: FILL IT UP AGAIN!  It's so good!  Once it hits your lips... it's so good!...

item.title: BlackOpsScrollers on BlackOpsAttack
item.description: In one of the most sarcastic episodes of SideScrollers in history, Craig, Destin and Chad address the folks that think our Black Ops coverage was too much and we "sold out".  Seriously?  Seriously?!
item.itunes:subtitle: In one of the most sarcastic episodes of SideScrollers in history, Craig, Destin and Chad address the folks that think our Black Ops coverage was too much and we "sold out".  Seriously?  Seriously?!...

item.title: SideScrollers 04.21.10
item.description:
In 2010 a crack commando unit was sent to prison by a military court
for a crime they didn't commit. These men promptly escaped from a
maximum security stockade to the Dallas underground. Today,
still wanted by the government, they survive as gust hosts for SideScrollers.
If you have a problem - if no one else can help - and if you can find
them - maybe you can hire: The A-Team.
